product_name: The North Face Base Camp Trifecta Sandals - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featuring a 3-strap design with toe loops to keep the shoes securely attached to your feet, The North Face Base Camp Trifecta sandals slide on easy and are well cushioned for all-day comfort. Polyurethane-coated synthetic straps are lined with a soft jersey fabric for comfort. Soft EVA midsoles with anatomic arch supports feature egg-crate inspired topsoles for comfort. Rubber outsoles provide traction. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring a 3-strap design with toe loops to keep the shoes securely attached to your feet, The North Face Base Camp Trifecta sandals slide on easy and are well cushioned for all-day comfort.
